anticipation.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon shudders if any foe has a supereffective or OHKO move and raises Speed by one stage.
anticipation.name: Anticipation

damp.shortDesc: Summons Water Sport and Mud Sport upon switching in.
damp.name: Damp

healer.shortDesc: Heals the user and its allies by 1/16 of their maximum HP at the end of each turn.
healer.name: Healer

illuminate.shortDesc: Halves damage from Dark and Ghost type moves.
illuminate.name: Illuminate

telepathy.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Psychic-type and have 1.2x power.
telepathy.name: Telepathy

shellarmor.shortDesc: No status = all moves hit target on Defense. Use Shell Smash = change abil to Weak Armor.
shellarmor.name: Shell Armor

battery.shortDesc: On switch in, this Pokemon and its allies use Charge.
battery.name: Battery

klutz.shortDesc: This Pokemon's contact moves remove the target's item. This Pokemon loses its item upon being hit.
klutz.name: Klutz

ironfist.shortDesc: This Pokemon's punch moves are super effective against Fairy-types.
ironfist.name: Iron Fist

receiver.shortDesc: Permanently copies the ability of the ally that fainted before switching in.
receiver.name: Receiver

sweetveil.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon's side gets a side condition that heals any active Pokemon by 1/16.
sweetveil.name: Sweet Veil

mummy.shortDesc: Gives all active Pokemon the Heal Block effect upon switching in.
mummy.name: Mummy

runaway.shortDesc: This Pokemon immediately switches out if an opponent with a super effective/OHKO move switches in.
runaway.name: Run Away

tangledfeet.shortDesc: This Pokemon's first move will have +1 priority until the end of the turn.
tangledfeet.name: Tangled Feet
